title: HitmanPro Alert 3.5.2.558 + Crack [4REALTORRENTZ]
description:
HitmanPro Alert is a lightweight application able to monitor your browser activity and detect potential threats that may comprise system security. The tool was specifically built to add an extra layer of security to your system, in order to protect you whenever you shop on the Internet or perform online banking operations. It offers real-time PC protection against software exploits, drive-by downloads, crypto-ransomware, online fraud, and identity theft.

Features:

- On-demand Malware Detection and Remediation
- Multilingual User Interface
- Safe Browsing (Man-in-the-Browser Detection)
- Active Vaccination
- CryptoGuard
- Webcam Notifier
- Keystroke Encryption
- Process Protection
- BadUSB Protection
- Exploit Mitigations

Supports:

- 32-bit and 64-bit versions of Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows Vista and Windows XP.

Instructions:

1. Unpack and install
2. Close all process's and services
3. Copy and replace contents of crack folder to installation directory
4. Or restart HMP.A Service.bat {Run as admin}
5. Done
